languages.text: {n}Префект поджимает сухие губы.{/n} "Незапланированные накладки при сеансах связи и транспортировке вмешались в работу наших структур. Из-за ненадлежащей подготовленности реквизированных нами средств мы потеряли часть своих исполнителей и ресурсов".

{n}The prefect's lips contort into a twist.{/n} "Our work has been disrupted by unforeseen setbacks regarding communication and transportation. As our requisitioned assets were not adequately prepared, we have lost some of our personnel and resources as a result."
languages.original_text: {n}Префект поджимает сухие губы.{/n} "Незапланированные накладки при сеансах связи и транспортировке вмешались в работу наших структур. Из-за ненадлежащей подготовленности реквизированных нами средств мы потеряли часть своих исполнителей и ресурсов".

languages.text: {n}La préfète pince les lèvres avec contrariété.{/n} « Notre travail a été perturbé par des contretemps imprévus en matière de communication et de transport. Les agents réquisitionnés pour le mener à bien étant insuffisamment préparés, nous avons essuyé des pertes aussi bien humaines que matérielles. »
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's lips contort into a twist.{/n} "Our work has been disrupted by unforeseen setbacks regarding communication and transportation. As our requisitioned assets were not adequately prepared, we have lost some of our personnel and resources as a result."

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète pince les lèvres avec contrariété.{/n} « Notre travail a été perturbé par des contretemps imprévus en matière de communication et de transport. Les agents réquisitionnés pour le mener à bien étant insuffisamment préparés, nous avons essuyé des pertes aussi bien humaines que matérielles. »

languages.text: {n}Los labios de la prefecta se retuercen en una mueca.{/n} «Unos contratiempos inesperados en la comunicación y el transporte han interferido en nuestro trabajo. Nuestros recursos requisados no estaban preparados de forma adecuada, y eso nos ha causado pérdidas personales y materiales».
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's lips contort into a twist.{/n} "Our work has been disrupted by unforeseen setbacks regarding communication and transportation. As our requisitioned assets were not adequately prepared, we have lost some of our personnel and resources as a result."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los labios de la prefecta se retuercen en una mueca.{/n} «Unos contratiempos inesperados en la comunicación y el transporte han interferido en nuestro trabajo. Nuestros recursos requisados no estaban preparados de forma adecuada, y eso nos ha causado pérdidas personales y materiales».

languages.text: {n}行政官嘴角抽搐了一下。{/n}“由于通讯与运输方面的意外事故，我们的工作被迫中断。我们之前征用的资源没有做好充分准备，我们也因此损失了部分人员与资源。”
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's lips contort into a twist.{/n} "Our work has been disrupted by unforeseen setbacks regarding communication and transportation. As our requisitioned assets were not adequately prepared, we have lost some of our personnel and resources as a result."

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官嘴角抽搐了一下。{/n}“由于通讯与运输方面的意外事故，我们的工作被迫中断。我们之前征用的资源没有做好充分准备，我们也因此损失了部分人员与资源。”

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin verzieht verächtlich die Lippen.{/n} "Unsere Arbeit wurde durch unvorhergesehene Rückschläge hinsichtlich der Kommunikation und des Transports unterbrochen. Da unsere requirierten Mitarbeiter nicht ausreichend vorbereitet waren, haben wir weite Teile unseres Personals und unserer Ressourcen verloren."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's lips contort into a twist.{/n} "Our work has been disrupted by unforeseen setbacks regarding communication and transportation. As our requisitioned assets were not adequately prepared, we have lost some of our personnel and resources as a result."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin verzieht verächtlich die Lippen.{/n} "Unsere Arbeit wurde durch unvorhergesehene Rückschläge hinsichtlich der Kommunikation und des Transports unterbrochen. Da unsere requirierten Mitarbeiter nicht ausreichend vorbereitet waren, haben wir weite Teile unseres Personals und unserer Ressourcen verloren."

languages.text: {n}総監の唇は歪ませる。{/n}「私たちの仕事が連絡および輸送に関して予期せぬ障害によって妨害されているのです。調達した資産が十分に準備されていなかったため、一部の人員と資源を失ってしまいました」
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's lips contort into a twist.{/n} "Our work has been disrupted by unforeseen setbacks regarding communication and transportation. As our requisitioned assets were not adequately prepared, we have lost some of our personnel and resources as a result."

traits.locale_text: {n}総監の唇は歪ませる。{/n}「私たちの仕事が連絡および輸送に関して予期せぬ障害によって妨害されているのです、ローグトレーダー。調達した資産が十分に準備されていなかったため、一部の人員と資源を失ってしまいました」

languages.text: {n}Prefektin dudakları bükülüyor.{/n} "Çalışmalarımız, iletişimle ve ulaşımla ilgili öngörülemeyen aksaklıklar sebebiyle sekteye uğradı. Talep edilen varlıklarımız tam olarak hazır olmadığından kimi personelimizi ve kaynaklarımızı kaybettik."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's lips contort into a twist.{/n} "Our work has been disrupted by unforeseen setbacks regarding communication and transportation. As our requisitioned assets were not adequately prepared, we have lost some of our personnel and resources as a result."

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefektin dudakları bükülüyor.{/n} "Çalışmalarımız, iletişimle ve ulaşımla ilgili öngörülemeyen aksaklıklar sebebiyle sekteye uğradı. Talep edilen varlıklarımız tam olarak hazır olmadığından kimi personelimizi ve kaynaklarımızı kaybettik."
